data.eml:eml: A new freshwater snail (Caenogastropoda: Cochliopidae) from the Atacama Desert, northern Chile

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Collado, Gonzalo A. (2015): A new freshwater snail (Caenogastropoda: Cochliopidae) from the Atacama Desert, northern Chile. Zootaxa 3925 (3): 445-449, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3925.3.9
